sourcesContent:
Custom checkbox

Use the .form-check-input and .form-check-label for checkbox. And filled checkbox used .checkbox-dashed-* and bordered checkbox used .checkbox-*.

Bordered Checkbox
@for (data of borderedCheckBox; track data) {
}
Icon Checkbox
    @for (data of iconCheckBox; track data) {
    • }
Filled Checkbox
@for (data of filledCheckBox; track data) {
